text: (yūsuḥp) avarkaḷukku vēṇṭiya poruḷ (tāṉiyaṅkaḷaic) cittam ceytu koṭutta pōtu, (avarkaḷai nōkki)"uṅkaḷ tantai vaḻic cakōtaraṉai (maṟumuṟai nīṅkaḷ iṅku varumpōtu) eṉṉiṭam aḻaittu vāruṅkaḷ. Niccayamāka nāṉ uṅkaḷukku (tāṉiyaṅkaḷai nirappamāka) aḷantu koṭuttataiyum, viruntupacāram ceyvatil nāṉ"ciṟantavaṉ" eṉpataiyum nīṅkaḷ pārkkavillaiyā
